wwutil.jsoda
Class Jsoda

java.lang.Object
  wwutil.jsoda.Jsoda

public class Jsoda
extends java.lang.Object

Simple object-db mapping service for AWS. Make storing POJO in SimpleDB/DynamoDB easy. Class is thread-safe. See utest.JsodaTest for usage.

Constructor Summary
Jsoda(com.amazonaws.auth.AWSCredentials cred)
          Create a Jsoda object with the AWS Access Key ID and Secret Access Key The tables in the database scope belonged to the AWS Access Key ID will be accessed.
Jsoda(com.amazonaws.auth.AWSCredentials cred, MemCacheable memCacheable)
          Set a cache service for the Jsoda object.

Create a Jsoda object with the AWS Access Key ID and Secret Access Key The tables in the database scope belonged to the AWS Access Key ID will be accessed.

Jsoda

public Jsoda(com.amazonaws.auth.AWSCredentials cred,
             MemCacheable memCacheable)
      throws java.lang.Exception
Set a cache service for the Jsoda object. All objects accessed via the Jsoda object will be cached according to their CachePolicy.

Throws:
java.lang.Exception
Method Detail

getMemCacheable

public MemCacheable getMemCacheable()
Return the cache service object. Should only use the returned MemCacheable for dumping caching statistics and nothing else.

setMemCacheable

public void setMemCacheable(MemCacheable memCacheable)
Set a new cache service for this Jsoda object. All old cached content are gone.

setDbEndpoint

public Jsoda setDbEndpoint(DbType dbtype,
                           java.lang.String endpoint)
Set the AWS service endpoint for the underlying dbtype. Different AWS region might have different endpoint.

shutdown

public void shutdown()
Shut down any underlying database services and free up resources

registerModel

public <T> void registerModel(java.lang.Class<T> modelClass)
                   throws JsodaException
Register a POJO model class. Calling again will re-register the model class, replacing the old one.

JsodaException

dao

public <T> Dao<T> dao(java.lang.Class<T> modelClass)
           throws JsodaException
Get the data access object for the model class. DAO has methods to load or save the data object. The modelClass is registered automatically if it has not been registered. 
 e.g.
   Dao<Model1> dao1 = jsoda.dao(Model1.class);
   Dao<Model2> dao2 = jsoda.dao(Model2.class);
   dao1.put(model1One);
   dao1.put(model1Two);
   dao2.put(model2One);
   dao2.put(model2Two);

Throws:
JsodaException

query

public <T> Query<T> query(java.lang.Class<T> modelClass)
               throws JsodaException
Create a Query object for a model class. Additional conditions can be specified on the query. Call this method or the Dao's constructor to create a dao for a model class. 
 e.g.
   Dao<Model1> query1 = jsoda.query(Model1.class);
   Dao<Model2> query2 = new Query<Model2>(Model2.class, jsoda);

Throws:
JsodaException

dump

public static java.lang.String dump(java.lang.Object obj)
Dump object's fields to string, for debugging.

preStoreSteps

public void preStoreSteps(java.lang.Object dataObj)
                   throws java.lang.Exception
Perform the pre-store steps to call the data generators, conversion, and validation on the object. The object is not stored yet; only its fields are transformed. Call this directly for debugging data conversion and validation.

Throws:
java.lang.Exception

postGetSteps

public void postGetSteps(java.lang.Object dataObj)
                  throws java.lang.Exception
Throws:
java.lang.Exception
